titleStmt.title: As Iheronimus, sheweth in this begynnynge, so wyll I wryte of the .iiij. tokens the whiche shall be shewed afore the dredefull daye of dome, of our lorde Ihesu Christe. For there shall we shewe ourself yonge and olde, [and]c.
Four tokens of judgement
titleStmt.author: Jerome, Saint, d. 419 or 20.

titleStmt.title: As Iheronimus, sheweth in this begynnynge, so wyll I wryte of the .iiij. tokens the whiche shall be shewed afore the dredefull daye of dome, of our lorde Ihesu Christe. For there shall we shewe ourself yonge and olde, [and]c.
Four tokens of judgement
titleStmt.author: Jerome, Saint, d. 419 or 20.
Doesborch, Jan van, d. 1536.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Printer's device (McKerrow 68 & 69) on B4v, final page.
Translated out of Dutch into English by Jan van Dousbrugh [i.e. Doesborch].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
